name: Global Football Multiple Choice Quiz | Soccer | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which South American country won the Copa America in 1979?
questions.explanation:
Paraguay.

	Paraguay won it way back in 1979. Out of the 39 times it has been staged, only five instances has it been won by a country other than the big three. Paraguay 2, Peru 2 and Bolivia 1.

questions.text: For which country does Zlatko Zahovic play for?
Who was Serie A's top scorer in the 99-00 season?
questions.explanation:
Shevchenko.

	The Ukranian who plays for AC Milan scored 24, one ahead of Batistuta.

questions.text: Which of these clubs has NOT won the German Bundesliga title during the 1990s?
questions.explanation:
Bayer Leverkusen.

	Kaiserslautern won it in both 1991 and 1998. Stuttgart in 1992 and Werder Bremen in 1993.

questions.text: What colour are IFK Gothenburg's home shorts?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	They play in blue and white striped shirts and blue shorts.

questions.text: Which city do the Spanish side, Celta come from?

questions.explanation:
Corsica.

	Situated off the south coast of France.
